items.description:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #353 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

A pretty quiet week after the announcement of GA last week, but you absolutely must catch up on the MAUI Luanch Party!

Have a great week!

Kym
items.description_markdown:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #353 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

Have a great week!

Kym

items.title: Microsoft Build 2022: Xamarin & MAUI Recap
items.description:
Microsoft Build 2022 was a recent online conference. In this post Dave Murray recaps sessions for .NET MAUI, Xamarin and React Native developers building cross platform native apps.

Microsoft Build 2022: Xamarin & MAUI Recap by Dave Murray
items.description_markdown:
Microsoft Build 2022 was a recent online conference. In this post Dave Murray recaps sessions for .NET MAUI, Xamarin and React Native developers building cross platform native apps.

[**Microsoft Build 2022: Xamarin & MAUI Recap**](https://blog.taranissoftware.com/microsoft-build-2022-xamarin-and-maui-recap) by [Dave Murray](https://github.com/irongut)

items.title: Let's Learn .NET - .NET MAUI (cross-platform apps in C#)
items.description:
In this month’s .NET beginner series, get a full introduction to build native, cross-platform desktop and mobile apps with .NET! Come to learn something new and leave with something that we all built, together, live with experts! Streaming LIVE on Learn TV!

items.description_markdown:
In this month’s .NET beginner series, get a full introduction to build native, cross-platform desktop and mobile apps with .NET! Come to learn something new and leave with something that we all built, together, live with experts! Streaming LIVE on Learn TV!

items.title: Creating .NET MAUI UIs in C# Markup
items.description:
Have you ever wanted to create your UI in .NET MAUI using C# instead of XAML? You can, using the .NET MAUI Community Toolkit C# Markup Extensions! Learn how to use the official open-source .NET MAUI C# Markup Extensions library to streamline your UI building process.

Creating .NET MAUI UIs in C# Markup by dotNet Youtube Channel
items.description_markdown:
Have you ever wanted to create your UI in .NET MAUI using C# instead of XAML? You can, using the .NET MAUI Community Toolkit C# Markup Extensions! Learn how to use the official open-source .NET MAUI C# Markup Extensions library to streamline your UI building process.

[**Creating .NET MAUI UIs in C# Markup**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vTtIhUCc2sU) by [dotNet Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/ucvtt19mzw8dq5wwfu6b0oxw)

items.title: VS2022 17.3 Preview 1.1 - Missing Xamarin SDKs
items.description:
This is a public service announcement from Dave Murray that the latest VS2022 preview Visual Studio 2022 17.3 Preview has gone all-in for MAUI. Which means, if you are looking to do some Xamarin work, you are going to have to install those components.

VS2022 17.3 Preview 1.1 - Missing Xamarin SDKs by Dave Murray
items.description_markdown:
This is a public service announcement from Dave Murray that the latest VS2022 preview Visual Studio 2022 17.3 Preview has gone all-in for MAUI. Which means, if you are looking to do some Xamarin work, you are going to have to install those components.

[**VS2022 17.3 Preview 1.1 - Missing Xamarin SDKs**](https://blog.taranissoftware.com/vs2022-173-preview-11-missing-xamarin-sdks) by [Dave Murray](https://github.com/irongut)
